business fields

KANSAIVINA is General Contractor of construction that comprehensively implements processes in civil and industrial construction projects.

GENERAL CONTRACTOR FOR INDUSTRIAL CONSTRUCTION

As the General Contractor, KANSAIVINA performs full tasks of an industrial construction project including design consultancy, MEP system installation, monitoring and management. These tasks will be implemented entirely or partly depending on the features of each project, the requirements of each investor and the field surveys.

Since 2011, we have been cooperating with big partners from Japan, Korea, Taiwan. Hence, we readily provide our best services in design and consultancy for your construction projects with reasonable cost. Especially, we implement the project under “Lump Sum Turn Key” contract, accordingly, the financial plans are all transparent and on budget.

DESIGN CONSULTING

In industrial construction projects, Design Consulting is the very first and important step. Project timelines and cost estimations in the following steps will be entirely affected by the accuracy of design planning. A quality design can help investors reducing 20 – 30% of labor cost and capacity optimization. Therefore, we pay special attention to this step.

After examining the features of each project, the functions of each construction platform, and the requirements of each investor, we will offer detailed directions for optimal solutions. We also support our clients in consulting the construction designs in the preparing stage: KANSAIVINA’s experts and investors will together work for proposing of construction concepts, master plans, site area…

SUPERVISION AND QUALITY MANAGEMENT

For industrial construction projects, even a small mistake can seriously affects the safety, the lifespan and the productivity of the facilities. Therefore, the monitoring and controlling process requires staffs who have had long-time experience and continuously gain knowledge of the latest technologies in this field. For over 8 years, KANSAIVINA have been trusted and appointed as a monitoring and quality management unit in many construction projects in Vietnam.

M.E.P SYSTEM CONTRACTOR

M.E.P system (Mechanical, Electrical and Plumbing) directly impacts productivity and safety in the workplaces. Accordingly, it needs to be not only warranted both functionality and aesthetics but also focused on safety, especially the electric system, fire protection system…KANSAIVINA is striving to be an experienced and qualified M.E.P contractor domestically and internationally.

smart factory

KANSAIVINA consult and apply the “Smart Factory” solution logically in construction implementation following requirements of investors as well as details of projects.

The smart factory systems are deployed in accordance with production features of each factory, so that KANSAIVINA can help investors to save implementation costs, to increase management efficiency, and to store project data smarter.
